page.title: 15A Fairfield Playground Game
page.content: In the school playground we play a game called Kingy.As many people as you like can play,you also need a ball.You stand in a circle with your legs about half a metre apart and wait for the person who is king to drop the ball into the centre of the circle. When the king has dropped the ball into the centre of the circle you wait and see which legs the ball rolls through.If the ball goes out of the circle you say,"broken window."You do this until the ball goes through somebodys legs.When the ball has rolled through somebody's legs that person is on.The person who is on chases the other people with the ball and tries to hit them with the ball (not too hard).If the person hits somebody with the ball then that person is on.
